Finally, participants created a basic outline of a privacy notice for their chosen process.

44214d55-555c-42d0-ad62-bb57b96647b1.description: Badge earners learned the basics of creating the foundation for effective change leadership by going through the process of building a coalition of functional leaders. They understand the benefit of governance comprised of cross-functional leadership and through a case, applied the steps to develop the stakeholder support needed to move initiatives forward on their campus.
44214d55-555c-42d0-ad62-bb57b96647b1.name: Transforming IT Governance from Operational to Strategic 2020

badge_template_activities.title: Badge earners created a current state map of their IT governance/decision-making processes; identified areas in need of improvement and of importance to the organization. They produced a problem statement and clearly articulated the need to transform IT governance in their organization. Finally, participants created a presentation and executive summary for their senior leadership along with a communications plan to support transparency, organizational awareness, and buy-in.
